segment.source: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display
segment.target: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display

segment.source: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display
segment.target: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display

segment.source: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display
segment.target: Apply, Create, or Delete a Preset Combination of Columns to Display

segment.source: You can apply presets that determine the columns that appear in a data table.
segment.target: You can apply presets that determine the columns that appear in a data table.

segment.source: To apply a preset
segment.target: To apply a preset

segment.source: In the data table, right-click the title bar.
segment.target: In the data table, right-click the title bar.

segment.source: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.
segment.target: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.

segment.source: On the title bar, click the down arrow.
segment.target: On the title bar, click the down arrow.

segment.source: Click the desired preset.
segment.target: Click the desired preset.

segment.source: To create a preset
segment.target: To create a preset

segment.source: In the data table, right-click the title bar.
segment.target: In the data table, right-click the title bar.

segment.source: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.
segment.target: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.

segment.source: Select the desired columns.
segment.target: Select the desired columns.

segment.source: At the bottom-left, click Manage.
segment.target: At the bottom-left, click Manage.

segment.source: Give your preset a name, and then click Save.
segment.target: Give your preset a name, and then click Save.

segment.source: To delete a preset
segment.target: To delete a preset

segment.source: In the data table, right-click the title bar.
segment.target: In the data table, right-click the title bar.

segment.source: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.
segment.target: Click Open View Editor at the bottom of the list of columns.

segment.source: At the bottom-left, click Manage.
segment.target: At the bottom-left, click Manage.

segment.source: Select the desired preset, and click Delete.
segment.target: Select the desired preset, and click Delete.
